channel.title: Hugo on Simple Codex
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Simple Codex

item.title: Second sample
item.description: This is a second sample! These site can be rebuilded in many different ways, but the most common way is to run hugo serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated. To add new posts, simply run: $ hugo new posts/my-sample-post.md
